location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Justin Sheil, HM Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran to Lieutenant Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the British Envoy approves of the steps he has taken in order to avert hostilities between Shaikh Hussein and Mustofa Koolee Khan Serteep.
